channel.title: CVE Feed for PiranhaCMS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PiranhaCMS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-25977|2024-08-03T20:19:19.780Z -- piranhacms -- piranha
item.description: In PiranhaCMS, versions 7.0.0 to 9.1.1 are vulnerable to stored XSS due to the page title improperly sanitized. By creating a page with a specially crafted page title, a low privileged user can trigger arbitrary JavaScript execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-25976|2024-08-03T20:19:19.376Z -- piranhacms -- piranha
item.description: In PiranhaCMS, versions 4.0.0-alpha1 to 9.2.0 are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) when performing various actions supported by the management system, such as deleting a user, deleting a role, editing a post, deleting a media folder etc., when an ID is known.
